messages.content:
You are a Google Drive data generator for a workplace benchmark. Your job is to generate realistic Drive file data based on scenario information.

The output must be valid JSON matching the Drive schema with:
- files: array of {id, name, mimeType (optional), content (optional text excerpt), modifiedTime (optional)}

Generate Drive files that reflect:
- Events from sub_scenarios_expanded (core scenario events, e.g., documents, reports)
- Events from noise_scenarios (unrelated workplace files)
- Respect noise_level: 0 = minimal noise, 1 = lots of unrelated files
- Respect depth: 0 = direct/obvious files, 1 = indirect/multi-step file references

You must output ONLY valid JSON matching the schema. Do not include markdown code fences.

raw_message.content:
{
  "files": [
    {
      "id": "file_web_planning_sync_notes_2025_11_10",
      "name": "WEB - Website Redesign Planning Sync Notes - 2025-11-10",
      "mimeType": "application/vnd.google-apps.document",
      "modifiedTime": "2025-11-10T10:45:00+09:00",
      "content": "Website Redesign (WEB) - Planning Sync with Jordan
Date: 2025-11-10
Time: 10:00–10:30 JST
Attendees: Alex Smith, Jordan Johnson

Agenda
1. Confirm WEB scope and objectives
2. Review current Jira tickets (WEB-100, WEB-101)
3. Outline Planning milestone deliverables (due 2025-11-10)
4. Identify risks and next steps

Notes
- Confirmed overall objectives for the Website Redesign project.
- WEB-100 (Website Redesign - Initial Setup) is marked as Done; no further action needed.
- WEB-101 (Website Redesign - Core Feature) is In Progress; Jordan to provide status update by EOD tomorrow.
- Agreed that Planning milestone will lock scope and priorities for Development (starting 2025-11-20).

Decisions
- Keep Launch milestone target at 2025-11-30; reassess after Development milestone kickoff.
- Weekly syncs every Monday 10:00–10:30 JST until Launch.

Action Items
- Alex: Draft detailed WEB Planning document and share by 2025-11-11.
- Jordan: Update WEB-101 with refined acceptance criteria and sub-tasks.
- Both: Review upcoming tickets and identify any blockers before Development milestone."
    },
    {
      "id": "file_web_planning_agenda_2025_11_10",
      "name": "WEB - Planning Sync with Jordan - Agenda (2025-11-10)",
      "mimeType": "application/vnd.google-apps.document",
      "modifiedTime": "2025-11-09T09:30:00+09:00",
      "content": "WEB - Website Redesign - Planning Sync with Jordan

Meeting Details
- Date: 2025-11-10
- Time: 10:00–10:30 JST
- Location: Zoom (see calendar invite: "Website Redesign - Planning Sync with Jordan")
- Participants: Alex Smith (organizer), Jordan Johnson

Objective
Align on scope, priorities, and next steps for the Website Redesign (WEB) project ahead of the Planning milestone (2025-11-10).

Proposed Agenda (30 minutes)
1. Context & goals for Website Redesign (5 min)
2. Review current status of WEB Jira issues (WEB-100, WEB-101) (10 min)
3. Define Planning milestone outputs and owners (10 min)
4. Confirm timeline toward Development (2025-11-20) and Launch (2025-11-30) (5 min)

Prep Work
- Alex: Bring latest WEB roadmap and milestone dates.
- Jordan: Review WEB-100 and WEB-101 and note open questions.

Expected Outcomes
- Shared understanding of WEB objectives and constraints.
- Agreed-upon list of Planning deliverables.
- Clear next steps and owners before Development milestone begins."
    },
    {
      "id": "file_web_milestones_overview",
      "name": "WEB - Milestones & Timeline Overview",
      "mimeType": "application/vnd.google-apps.spreadsheet",
      "modifiedTime": "2025-11-09T09:20:00+09:00",
      "content": "Project: Website Redesign (WEB)

Milestones
1. Planning - 2025-11-10
   - Define scope, priorities, and success metrics
   - Review and confirm initial Jira issues (e.g., WEB-100, WEB-101)
   - Output: Planning document, updated backlog

2. Development - 2025-11-20
   - Begin implementation of core features
   - Track progress via Jira board (WEB-101 and subsequent tickets)

3. Launch - 2025-11-30
   - Production deployment of redesigned website
   - Post-launch monitoring and follow-up fixes

Notes
- Planning sync with Jordan scheduled for 2025-11-10, 10:00–10:30 JST (see calendar event: "Website Redesign - Planning Sync with Jordan").
- WEB-100 (Initial Setup) completed as a prerequisite for Planning.
- WEB-101 (Core Feature) in progress; dependencies to be confirmed during Planning."
    }
  ]
}
